definitions.definition: A poplar tree , especially of section Populus sect. Populus , of medium-size trees with thin, straight trunks of a greenish-white color.
examples: Above a certain elevation, the aspens gave way to scrubby, gnarled pines.

definitions.definition: The wood of such a tree; usually pale, lightweight and soft.
examples: She claimed that aspen was the only "proper" material from which to make a wicker basket.

main_definition: A poplar tree , especially of section Populus sect. Populus , of medium-size trees with thin, straight trunks of a greenish-white color.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The wood of such a tree; usually pale, lightweight and soft.
